Articles.Content:
Hi folks. I was looking up related information on reacting flows and ran across some open-access lecture notes online. It's a graduate-level MIT course on rocket propulsion. I figured it might be of interest to folks here. The lectures are here:

http://ocw.mit.edu/courses/aeronautics-and-astronautics/16-512-rocket-propulsion-fall-2005/lecture-notes/

enjoy!
hooray! something to add to my over-extended reading list. rocket science gets pushed to the front of the queue, of course.
